channel.title: Taboola Mobile SDK Documentation Website
channel.description: Welcome to the Taboola Mobile SDK documentation website. You'll find comprehensive guides and examples to help you start working with Taboola SDK as quickly as possible, as well as support if you get stuck. Let's jump right in!

item.title: New react-native plugin version - 1.2.3
item.description: We're happy to announce a new version for our react-native plugin. We added two additions to the plugin The plugin verified on the new react-native version 0.62.xThe publisher (you) is now in charge to open the organic items when using the onOrganicItemClick event. We will no longer open it on a C...

item.title: Taboola SDK case studies
item.description: We are delighted to share with you three case studies of publishers who implemented the Taboola SDK on their apps:TalkATone app Fox Sports Australia The Hindu

item.title: New Android and iOS SDK version 2.4.0
item.description: 25/2/2020 updateWe released iOS SDK 2.4.1 with a hotfix to an issue that prevented some apps from submitting their versions to the App Store We're happy to announce our new Android and iOS SDK latest version! - 2.4.0 We recommend our publishers to upgrade to this version when they can; Android + iO...

item.title: New iOS SDK version 2.3.11
item.description: We're happy to announce our new iOS SDK - 2.3.10, following SDK 2.3.11 release. These two versions are a hotfixes that changes the name of the CMPDataStorageUserDefaults library and symbols in the SDK to TaboolaCMPDataStorageUserDefaults to avoid conflicts with other GDPR CMP SDKs iOS SDK changelo...

item.title: New Android and iOS SDK version 2.3.9
item.description: We're happy to announce our new Android and iOS SDK latest version! - 2.3.9 Android SDK changelog link - https://sdk.taboola.com/taboolasdk/docs/taboola-android-sdk-changelog iOS SDK changelog link - https://sdk.taboola.com/taboolasdk/docs/taboola-ios-sdk-changelog

item.title: New iOS SDK version - 2.3.8
item.description: We've just released a new iOS SDK version (special version) that fixes an issue that prevented iOS SDK API publishers (Swift only) from using the click handler.

item.title: New Android and iOS SDK version - 2.3.7
item.description: We're happy to announce our new Android and iOS SDK latest version! - 2.3.7 iOS SDK 2.3.7 changelog: Added support to position TaboolaWidget by using Constraints in addition to frames (widget / feed)Added the option to hide the scrolling bars for Feed via Native. See the SDK reference to see howThe...

item.title: New Android SDK version - 2.3.6
item.description: We're happy to announce the new Android SDK latest version! - 2.3.6 This version is adding an option to hide the scrolling bars when using Widget/Feed via Native and fixes two minor bugs related to SDK API and Newsroom. SDK Changelog - see hereSDK Installation - see here

item.title: New iOS SDK version - 2.3.6
item.description: We're happy to announce the new iOS SDK latest version! - 2.3.6 This version fixes an issue that caused the Feed via Native scrolling not to work when very slowly scrolling up and down the Feed. SDK Changelog - see hereSDK Installation - see here

item.title: New Android and iOS SDK version - 2.3.5
item.description: We're happy to announce our new Android and iOS SDK latest version! - 2.3.5 The main scope of this version was bug fixes and performance improvements. Please see the following changelog for more information: Android SDK - https://sdk.taboola.com/taboolasdk/docs/taboola-android-sdk-changelog#section-...

item.title: New Android SDK version (2.3.0) and iOS SDK version (2.3.1)
item.description: We're happy to announce a new major release for mobile SDK - version 2.3.0 for Android Android and 2.3.1 for iOS This SDK version includes new additions, better stability, bug fixes and other under-the-hood performance improvements. To ensure you are taking advantage of all of the latest and greates...

item.title: New Android SDK (2.2.3) and iOS SDK (2.1.6)
item.description: We're happy to announce our new Android (2.2.3) and iOS SDK (2.1.6) versions. Android SDK full change log - https://sdk.taboola.com/taboolasdk/docs/taboola-android-sdk-changelog#section-222-2019-06-05 iOS SDK full change log - https://sdk.taboola.com/taboolasdk/docs/taboola-ios-sdk-changelog#section...

item.title: New Android SDK (2.2.1) and iOS SDK (2.1.5)
item.description: We're happy to announce our new Android (2.2.1) and iOS SDK (2.1.5) versions. Android SDK changelog - https://sdk.taboola.com/taboolasdk/docs/taboola-android-sdk-changelog#section-221-2019-05-12 iOS SDK changelog - https://sdk.taboola.com/taboolasdk/docs/taboola-ios-sdk-changelog#section-215-2019-0...

item.title: Announcing Taboola react-native plugin beta
item.description: We are very thrilled to introduce our new Taboola react-native plugin React Native is an open-source mobile application framework created by Facebook. It is used to develop applications for Android, iOS apps by enabling developers to use React along with native platform. This framework is being adop...

item.title: New Android SDK (2.2.0) and iOS SDK (2.1.3)
item.description: We're happy to announce our new Android (2.2.0) and iOS SDK (2.1.3) versions. These SDK versions brings more features, improvements and bug fixes. Android SDK changelog - https://sdk.taboola.com/taboolasdk/docs/taboola-android-sdk-changelog#section-220-2019-04-03 iOS SDK changelog - https://sdk.tab...

item.title: New Android and iOS SDK version 2.1.1
item.description: We're happy to announce our new Android and iOS SDK latest version! - 2.1.1 The main scope of this version was adding a new UI indicator for scroll switch event in the Feed via Native integration. Adding an endless to your apps requires us to shift the scrolling from the app into our Taboola Feed. S...

item.title: New developers website
item.description: We're excited to launch Taboola's new SDK developers website. Please keep in mind that we're still adjusting and building this website, so some links might be broken.
